short_summary: Amendment 002This amendment is raised to answer a question and to extend the bid solicitation by 2 weeks to 18 April 2023.
description: This procurement is for the purchase of spare parts, heavy logistics vehicle wheeled (HLVW) for the Department of National Defence.
full_summary:
## Request for Proposal: Spare Parts for Heavy Logistics Vehicle Wheeled (HLVW)

**Notification**

The Department of National Defence invites proposals for the supply of spare parts for Heavy Logistics Vehicle Wheeled (HLVW).

**Notice Details**

*   **Reference Number**: PW-23-01027527
*   **Solicitation Number**: W8486-239005/A
*   **Publication Date**: 2023-02-23
*   **Tender Closing Date**: 2023-04-18T14:00:00

**Scope of Work**

Bidders must propose the supply of the following goods:

*   Electrical relays (20 units)
*   Pneumatic tools assembly (15 units)
*   Street lighting (10 units)
*   Cylinder making tools (10 units)

**Government Industry Classification (GSIN)**

*   5945 - Vehicular brake, steering, axle, wheel, and track components
*   5307 - Vehicular components, miscellaneous
*   6685 - Hose and flexible tubing
*   4720 - Hose and fittings
*   5340 - Mounts
*   2590 - Brackets
*   4730 - Clamps
*   2510 - Plates and roller bearings
*   5310 - Washers
*   4720 - Hose and fittings (second entry)
*   2530 - Wheel locks
*   5340 - Caps and filler openings
*   6230 - Electric lights
*   5331 - O-rings
*   5340 - Angle brackets

**Delivery Address**

The following Delivery Addresses have been specified:

*   25 CFSD, Montreal
*   7 CFSD, Edmonton

**Request for Submission**

Interested bidders are required to submit their proposals electronically to [DLP53BidsReceiving.DAAT53Receptiondessoumissions@forces.gc.ca](mailto:DLP53BidsReceiving.DAAT53Receptiondessoumissions@forces.gc.ca)

**Documentation**

Copies of the Solicitation documents are available on [Canadabuys.canada.ca](http://canadabuys.canada.ca) with the Document ID (s) w8486-239005\_hlvw\_spares\_rfp\_amendment\_002\_bilingual.pdf.

**Language of Documents**

Documents submitted will be in either English or French. Documents
